about_the_game:
About the Game

Step back into the nostalgia of the early internet with GlitchGuesser, the ultimate party game that turns pixelated chaos into a thrilling guessing competition! As distorted, compressed images gradually become clear, it’s a race against time to figure out what you’re seeing. Can you guess before anyone else?

Whether it’s a movie still, an anime character, a famous brand, or even custom creations, GlitchGuesser offers endless fun for players of all skill levels.

Key Features

🎮 Diverse Image Packs

  • Guess from curated packs like Movie Stills, Anime Covers, Cartoon Characters, and Video Game Screenshots. More packs are on the way to keep the fun fresh and exciting!

🛠️ Steam Workshop Integration

  • Get creative by designing your own packs with Steam Workshop. Share them with the community or play with your friends’ creations.

📱 Multiplayer Accessibility

  • Connect from anywhere via Twitch, a website, or the mobile app. Your entire party can join the fun, whether they’re in the same room or halfway across the world.

🤔 Dynamic Gameplay

  • Images start as pixelated blurs and slowly sharpen over time. Adjust the reveal speed for fast-paced sessions or a slower, more methodical challenge.

🤹 Automated Fun

  • The game runs itself, making it perfect for parties. Even the host can join the guessing action!

✨ Twitch Integration

  • Let your Twitch viewers play along in real-time! Perfect for streamers looking to engage their audience with an interactive party game.

How to Play

  • Fire up GlitchGuesser on your PC or Steam Deck.

  • Select an image pack (or load a custom one).

  • Share the game code with friends or viewers so they can connect via Twitch, web, or mobile.

  • Guess as the pixelated image sharpens! Points are awarded for accuracy and speed.

Endless Replayability

With a growing library of image packs and the power of community-created content through Steam Workshop, GlitchGuesser is a game you’ll return to again and again.

Get Ready to Guess!

Whether you’re hosting a party, entertaining your Twitch audience, or simply looking for a hilarious challenge with friends, GlitchGuesser is the perfect blend of nostalgia and competition. Can you outguess your rivals?

Wishlist now and prepare to get pixelated!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE3 capable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: GlitchGuesser is a party game where pixelated images slowly reveal themselves as players race to guess what they are! Play with movie stills, animes, cartoon characters, and more—or create custom packs via Steam Workshop. Connect via Twitch, website, or mobile and let the fun unfold!
